title: Rule 10: Verifiable Consent for Children and Persons with Disabilities
description: Rule 10 introduces additional safeguards for the protection of children and persons with disabilities who may not be in a position to fully understand the implications of sharing their personal data. To ensure fairness, the law requires that their data can only be processed with verifiable consent from a parent or a lawful guardian.
